issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Tapping on base UI does not open any page.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for Windows Phone mango). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on Base UI tab.
6.Tap on the tab group table row.
7.You will notice that nothing happens on tapping on tab roups.

Actual result:
1.Tapping on base UI does not open any page.

Expected result:
1.should see 6 buttons . 
  A. Add/Remove TAB 
  B. Animate Tab Group 
  C.Close/Animate Tab Group 
  D.Set Active Tab(Index) 
  E.Set Active Tab(Object) 
  F.Switch customization off
fields.summary: MobileWeb: BaseUI-->Tab Groups:Tapping on base UI does not open any page.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206010843
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v2012060201244
Iphone 4.3.5
Windows Phone Mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
